item.title: The Role of Data Centers in Scaling AI Products: Strategies for Product Managers
item.description:
The Role of Data Centers in Scaling AI Products: Strategies for Product Managers

Understanding Data Center Impact on AI Product Performance

Data centers are critical for AI operations due to their role in computing power and data storage. Effective utilization of data centers impacts latency, compliance, and cost-efficiency:

  • Latency: AI applications, particularly those requiring real-time insights, depend on low latency. Data center proximity to end-users reduces transmission delay.

  • Compliance: Geographical location of data centers can affect regulatory compliance, especially with laws around data sovereignty.

item.title: Building Froodo: My Entrepreneurial Journey to 500 Daily Orders
item.description:
Building Froodo: My Entrepreneurial Journey to 500 Daily Orders

Embarking on an entrepreneurial journey feels like assembling a parachute mid-fall. Here’s my story from 2018.

In 2018, I co-founded Froodo, a subscription-based healthy snacking business delivering fresh, chilled cut fruit boxes to customers’ doorsteps. It wasn’t just a business — it was a crash course in customer acquisition, growth hacking, hiring, finance, operations, and customer service.

The AHA Moment: Identifying the Problem

The idea came from a personal pain point.

item.title: How I Boosted SWVL’s GMV with Cross-Selling Packages
item.description:
How I Boosted SWVL’s GMV with Cross-Selling Packages

Introduction

I joined SWVL in February 2021, just after the pandemic, to lead growth products. One of the most promising levers was the Packages product—a prepaid ride bundle that allowed users to buy multiple rides at a discount.

For users: it meant lower per-ride costs.
For SWVL: it drove higher LTV, retention, and ride frequency.
The mission was clear: increase package sales to directly impact GMV.

item.title: How I Built and Launched a SaaS Platform for Creators and Got 5000 Signups in the First Month with Limited Budget
item.description:
How I Built and Launched a SaaS Platform for Creators and Got 5000 Signups in the First Month with Limited Budget

Starting from Scratch

When I left SWVL, I joined Shooty, an early-stage startup with no product vision and a small tech team. The shift—from a structured product environment to a blank slate—forced me to build everything from the ground up.

The first challenge: what are we building?
The second: who do we need to build it?

item.title: How I Increased Nykaa's Mega Sales Revenue by 10% Using a Simple CRO Hack and Data
item.description:
How I Increased Nykaa’s Mega Sales Revenue by 10% Using a Simple CRO Hack and Data

Company Background

Nykaa is India’s leading e-retailer for beauty and cosmetics—comparable to Sephora in the U.S.
Listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), Nykaa held a valuation of $6B at the time.

Project Context

In 2016, I was heading Product and Analytics at Nykaa. One of my key mandates was improving conversion rates during Mega Sales, which were high-stakes, high-volume events.

item.title: How I Used My Product Management Learnings to Help a Friend’s Offline Business
item.description:
How I Used My Product Management Learnings to Help a Friend’s Offline Business

It all started when I was having a conversation with my childhood friend who owns a baby product shop in a small town in India.

He asked me, “We have been friends for so long but I still do not know what you do for work.”

I told him about Product Management and tried to explain it with the usual jargon—but obviously, he got confused. Then I simplified: we identify problems that customers face and solve them in a way that’s good for both the customer and the business.

item.title: Navigating the AI Revolution: How Product Managers Can Stay Relevant and Thrive
item.description:
Navigating the AI Revolution: How Product Managers Can Stay Relevant and Thrive

The rapid advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) are transforming industries across the globe. For product managers, the AI revolution presents both unprecedented opportunities and formidable challenges. Understanding how to navigate these changes effectively is crucial for staying relevant and thriving in your career.

Embracing Change and Understanding AI

AI technologies are reshaping how products are developed, marketed, and managed. As a product manager, gaining a foundational understanding of AI and its implications is critical. Start by exploring the basics of AI, including machine learning, natural language processing, and robotic process automation.

item.title: Decoding Product Management: Unique Challenges in the UAE Compared to the World
item.description:
Decoding Product Management: Unique Challenges in the UAE Compared to the World

Introduction

Product management has become a pivotal role in businesses worldwide, adapting products to meet ever-evolving market needs and customer expectations. However, in the UAE, product managers face distinct challenges not as prevalent in other parts of the world. This post explores these unique hurdles and offers insights into navigating them effectively.

Cultural Diversity and Consumer Behavior

The UAE’s population is a rich tapestry of ethnicities, with expatriates making up a substantial portion of the residents. This diversity significantly influences product management strategies in the region.

item.title: The Art of the PRD in AI Applications: A Comprehensive Guide for Product Managers
item.description:
The Art of the PRD in AI Applications: A Comprehensive Guide for Product Managers

Introduction

In the rapidly evolving field of artificial intelligence, the importance of a well-crafted Product Requirements Document (PRD) cannot be overstated. As a bridge between the visionary and the practical, a PRD translates high-level business and user needs into detailed, actionable requirements that guide the development team. This guide will walk you through the essential elements of creating effective PRDs specifically tailored for AI applications.

item.title: The Aspiring Product Manager's Guide to Mastering User-Centric Design in 2024
item.description:
The Aspiring Product Manager’s Guide to Mastering User-Centric Design in 2024

Introduction

In the rapidly evolving tech landscape of 2024, mastering user-centric design is more crucial than ever for aspiring product managers. This guide provides a comprehensive approach to understanding and implementing user-centric design principles to create products that truly resonate with users.

Understanding User-Centric Design

User-centric design (UCD) is a framework that places the user at the heart of the design and development process. This approach aims to tailor products to meet the specific needs and wants of users, enhancing user satisfaction and engagement.

item.title: The Insider’s Guide to Breaking into Product Management in Dubai’s Thriving Tech Scene
item.description:
The Insider’s Guide to Breaking into Product Management in Dubai’s Thriving Tech Scene

Introduction

Dubai is rapidly becoming a hub for technology and innovation in the Middle East, rivalling traditional tech-heavy regions. With this growth comes an increased demand for product managers who can navigate the complexities of the tech market and steer products to success. If you’re looking to break into product management in this vibrant scene, here are some insider tips and strategies to get you started.
